attributes.action: Let people have the choice as to whether they pay the TV licence.
attributes.additional_details: There are several streaming services which offer far better value for money. It’s time for the BBC to modernise and offer choices, if this means advertising on their channels so be it. Forcing people to pay a tax for their service is unfair and outdated.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to make the BBC a subscription only service, which will give the people a choice, rather than an enforced Tax.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Abolish the tv licence
